dict.acceptation: 成果；水果；果实；（大地的）产物；

sent.orig: While producing jam, fruit-cake, jelly, drink containing fruit-flesh or tin containing fruit and fruit-juice etc.
sent.trans: 在制作果酱、果膏、果冻、含有水果肉的饮料及含水果、果汁的罐头中，加入假酸浆胶质，用于上述产品的增稠和悬浮。

sent.orig: Technically, a tomato a fruit -- the fruit -- the fruit of the tomato plant.
sent.trans: 从专业上说，西红柿是水果，西红柿这种植物结的果实。

sent.orig: It also involves canned6 fruit, dried fruit, and exporting large amounts of fruit to other countries.
sent.trans: 它还包括罐头水果、水果干及外销大量水果到其它国家去。

sent.orig: The can of fruit was made from processed fruit pulp.
sent.trans: 这种水果罐头是由肉果加工制成的。

sent.orig: Technically, a tomato a fruit -- the fruit of the tomato plant.
sent.trans: 从技术上来说番茄是水果，是番茄植株的果实。
